review: He is the most eminent physician,u can blindly trust his advice and even to his students he is good academic guider. He is genuine as a person and in his care  towards his patients, n can give selfless advice at any time, even about any complicated cases u have to know he is the one to be approached. Thanku sir.

You really cannot describe with words.  He is very talented and understands the patients perfectly.  He treated my father in 2014 and post that he is our family doctor.  ** ** *** ***** *******  I am being treated for respiratory problems today and I am confident I will be cured completely.  My mother gets treatment for diabetes and blood pressure.  Honestly he is a godsend.  Thanks Dr Basavaraj.

He made my treatment as simple as it could be. His explanation about the problem assessment was too good. I am very much impressed with his way of approach. I obtained maximum results out of prescribed medications in estimated period. For the consultation, I should have to wait around 30 minutes as I was quite behind the queue. But overall consultation was comfortable and satisfactory.

Although I won't visit him on a regular basis, I am consulting him from the year 2015. I'm very happy with his guidance and have obtained an extreme satisfaction with his treatment. All these years with Manipal has been a very good experience. It takes time for the consultation depending on availability but still it has never bothered me anyway.
